text: Answer: 6 Solution: A Load/Store instruction takes total 15 cycles and other instruction takes total 9 cycles. So total cycles to execute 1 billion instructions is 0.5 * 15 * 10Â° + 0.5 * 9 * 109 = 1.2 x 101 cycles. So, execution time of 1 billion instructions is (1.2 x 1010 x 1)/2 x 109 = 6 seconds. Correct answer 6
